author: Michael Moore
method: Place all the ingredients in a pan, except the rum. Cook slowly for one hour 15 minutes, then add the rum. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: 6 large apples, diced ,  1 litre/1 pint 15fl oz cider,  250ml/8¾fl oz dark rum,  3 cinnamon sticks,  3 star anise,  1 litre/1 pint 15fl oz water,  100g/3½oz sugar
